mapper.select: WITH ORDEREDNTC AS ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( select REQ_NO, REQ_TTL, REQ_DT , (C.DEP_NAME || ' ' || B.EMP_NAME) AS EMP_NAME, REQ_PW, REQ_CHECK FROM REQ_BOARD A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON( A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON(B.DEP_CD = C.DEP_CD) ORDER BY A.REQ_NO DESC ) A ) SELECT * FROM ORDEREDNTC WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT REQ_DT, REQ_TTL, A.EMP_CD, B.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME, EMP_PW, REQ_CN, REQ_PW, REQ_NO, DEP_NAME , REQ_CHECK FROM REQ_BOARD A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON( A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD) INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON(B.DEP_CD = C.DEP_CD) WHERE REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum , REQ_NO , REQ_TTL , REQ_CN , REQ_DT , REQ_CHECK , EMP_NAME FROM REQ_BOARD R LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(R.EMP_CD = E.EMP_CD) WHERE R.EMP_CD = #{empCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT REQ_NO, EMP_NAME, REQ_TTL, REQ_CN, REQ_DT, REQ_PW, REQ_CHECK FROM REQ_BOARD RB LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(RB.EMP_CD = E.EMP_CD) WHERE REQ_CHECK = 'N' ORDER BY REQ_DT DESC )A
